name: hopAppMiyoshiHimawari
description:
The Hands-on Portal Himawari application loader is used to load the Webbles necessary for the Himawari application developed for the Hands-on Portal project.

This Webble will also react to resizing of the browser window and try to resize and move the visualization Webbles around to fit the new browser window size.
keywords: Digital Dashboard, Hands-on Portal, hop, Miyoshi group, app, dashboardTNG
author: digitalDashboardTNG
